title: Sermon On The Full Armor Of God (First Draft)
content:
In all things, the Holy Spirit is most welcome to teach me all things pertaining the Lord. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFByOX8Fb0M

So what's the first thing in your mind when you wake up. For me it's all Jesus. This morning apart from all the light I was thinking of what I was reading yesterday. Sermon preparation. Wow. So hard. I had to slow down and take so many notes so that I get this right or I will lose points. In all of this, I have been reminded that it's not the points that are important at the end of the day but the heart. A heart changed towards a Holy God is far more important than points. So, I plod on and on and on and on. The points would be nice too Lord Jesus. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N2h9Hm9JZho

I am prompted by the Holy Spirit that without the glory of the Lord, His Presence, the Presence of a Holy God, I have nothing for He leads us to all truth.

Delicious. 
The fruit of the Spirit.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vSxocnIaN0A
In all of this do no forget to bless the Lord with all of my heart and mind and strength.
I
